20. Unit Manager Class¶

20.1. Unit Manager Class – sinon.unit_manager¶

class sinon.api.unit_manager.UnitManager(url=None, scheduler='default', session=None)[source]¶

Bases: sinon.api.attributes.Attributes

UnitManager class – manages a pool

add_pilot(pid, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

add (Compute or Data)-Pilot(s) to the pool

list_pilots(ptype=3, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

List IDs of data and/or compute pilots

remove_pilot(pid, drain=True, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Remove pilot(s) (does not cancel the pilot(s), but removes all units from the pilot(s).

submit_unit(description, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Instantiate and return (Compute or Data)-Unit object(s)

list_units(utype=3, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

List IDs of data and/or compute units

get_unit(uids, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Reconnect to and return (Compute or Data)-Unit object(s)

wait_unit(uids, state=['Done', 'Failed', 'Canceled'], timeout=-1.0, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Wait for given unit(s) to enter given state

cancel_units(uids, ttype='Sync')[source]¶

Cancel given unit(s)
